name: Deep Sewers
description:
Lore

Explore the deepness of the dark sewers and clean the acid puddles in your way.

It is not a good job for a rabbit but somebody had to do it...

Upgrade youe equipment in the shop as you go deep and deep in the sewer to survive longer.

Controls

WASD: Move

E: Interact

Shift: Sprint

Left Click: Clean puddles

Credits

Game developed by Turtle Games for the Ludum Dare game jam 48.

ilbini - Programming

rubinoffSama - Art and Models

Teddy - Programming and Sound
